attributes.title: Constantly crashing
attributes.review: I got the app to see if the hype about trump is worth it? The app took forever to download and I have decent WiFi at my house. Then once it finally downloaded it would crash constantly.

attributes.title: Broke my phone
attributes.review: This app made my phone explode and I had to buy a new one. Who’s gonna pay for that?!  I also went blind from looking at the bright sunny orange complexion of Trump. Further this app gave me AIDs anddd the Rona. I haven’t stopped having diarrhea since downloading this app, beware!

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: Donald trump... hmmm oh! He wants get rid of an app that has pulled me out of depression just like many others! And so I downloaded this app thinking it was going to change my mind about him. It didn’t. But I really tried to give it a shot it was a HUGE waste of time!

attributes.title: No🥰
attributes.review: ✨🧚🏼‍♂️So when I went to type my phone number in, Trump sent evil ninjas to my house and I had to fight them off but when I was trying to fight them off they were yelling the Spongebob theme song!!! and I almost died. I trusted my orange god🟠, but he let me down.✨🧚🏼‍♂️

attributes.title: Awful App!
attributes.review: This thing is so glitchy! The app freezes constantly and closes itself out all the time. It’s not functional at all. Impossible to use without getting frustrated. Very annoying.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and then instantly my phone was super glitchy, I was so slow it wasn’t usable, it took forever to delete this terrible app, I caution everyone to not get this app, it will ruin your phone and your life.

attributes.title: Vote the app 1 star omg it’s bad
attributes.review: Don’t even get me started on how bad this app is trumps a racist and a rapist not only is this glitchy and then he’s banningtiktok and that’s where it comes to a end this needs to stop the 1 star is down there what is holding u back PLeASe we need him gone 😭

attributes.title: DELETE THIS APP RIGHT NOW APPLE
attributes.review: this app has put me through so much . i almost passed away from this app . please delete this app off of the app store . donald whatever can choke on a stick . really apple i thought you were better than this , to have an app dedicated to the WORST HUMAN BEING . bye ⛓🪓🔪⚰️🔫 .

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in an attempt to find reasons to re-elect Trump. But alas, he’s a terrible person with no good qualities. And of course, no app could help fix that issue. So I see this app as completely useless. I would give it zero stars if I could.

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: I wanted to find a reason to support our badly spray tanned president, but alas I came up empty. In fact I think I found more reasons as to why I don’t support him. Not only that, the app does not work at all! Opened it up to a picture of a racist! Absolutely outraged!
